scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, desaturated muted color grade with washed-out tones, overcast flat lighting aesthetic, realistic contemporary feel

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional moves through Urban City Streets during morning commute. The character has medium-warm skin tone, dark brown textured hair, wearing charcoal gray blazer over white dress shirt and dark indigo jeans. They walk with hunched shoulders, fatigued expression, eyes squinting against harsh light, clutching a small black leather sunglasses case (containing SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses) in their right hand close to their chest. The urban environment is washed-out and colorless - gray concrete sidewalks, muted beige and white building facades, desaturated storefronts. Background commuters appear frozen mid-stride like mannequins, completely still and lifeless, creating an eerie suspended atmosphere. The character is the only moving element in an otherwise frozen world.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Wide shot at eye level, character positioned center-right of frame walking toward camera at slight angle, frozen crowd visible in background and mid-ground
Camera motion: Slow steady dolly-in toward character, maintaining eye level, gradually tightening from wide to medium-wide
Lighting: Flat overcast daylight with no strong shadows, diffused and even, cold temperature, harsh quality that makes character squint
Mood: Dulled, fatigued, disconnected, isolated despite crowd, visually oppressive

Actions:
- Character takes four slow steps forward through frozen crowd (0-2 seconds)
- Camera slowly pushes in as character clutches sunglasses case tighter to chest (2-4 seconds)
- Character's squinting intensifies, subtle head turn showing discomfort with light, frozen commuters remain perfectly still in background (4-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Minimal ambient soundscape, muted and distant city sounds, low rumbling bass drone, sparse and empty atmosphere, slow tempo around 60 BPM, cold synthesizer pads, no rhythm section, unsettling quiet with occasional muffled street noise, desaturated sonic palette matching visual mood

- Main Character - Urban Professional (reference image shows: late 20s to early 30s individual with natural medium-warm skin tone, strong defined facial features with high cheekbones and angular jawline, medium-length dark brown hair styled in modern textured cut with natural wave, clean-shaven or subtle stubble, athletic-lean build, wearing tailored charcoal gray wool blazer over white crisp cotton dress shirt, slim-fit dark indigo jeans, minimalist black leather Chelsea boots, confident neutral expression) - USE THIS REFERENCE IMAGE AS BASE AND MODIFY IT TO: fatigued weary expression, eyes squinting against harsh light, shoulders hunched forward, posture deflated and tired, NOT wearing sunglasses, clutching small black leather sunglasses case in right hand close to chest, walking with slow heavy steps
- Urban City Streets (reference image shows: modern metropolitan downtown district with wide sidewalks, contemporary glass-and-steel buildings, urban storefronts, clean concrete pavement, neutral color palette of grays whites and muted earth tones, natural daylight) - USE THIS REFERENCE IMAGE AS BASE AND MODIFY IT TO: heavily desaturated washed-out appearance, colors drained to pale grays and beiges, lifeless atmosphere, background commuters frozen mid-stride like mannequins, completely still poses, eerie suspended time feeling
- SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses (reference image shows: gold metal frame aviator sunglasses with double bridge, thin temples, teardrop-shaped polarized dark gray-green lenses, polished gold finish, classic proportions) - NOT visible on character's face, contained inside closed black leather sunglasses case that character is clutching

Composition: Wide shot 16:9 aspect ratio, character positioned center-right of frame walking toward camera, frozen mannequin-like commuters in background and mid-ground creating depth, washed-out urban environment, character is only moving element, hyper-realistic photorealistic documentary photography style, 8K detail, authentic urban atmosphere with desaturated color palette, professional cinema camera aesthetic with natural grain texture.

visual_effects.name: Freezing
visual_effects.description: Time freezes as glasses go on—breath becomes visible, motion stops. Perfect for showing the moment everything changes
visual_effects.timing: Throughout scene (background commuters frozen while main character moves)

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style transitioning to cinematic, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, color grade shifting from desaturated to warm saturated tones, dramatic lighting transformation, realistic with subtle magical realism elements

Scene Description: Extreme close-up of Main Character - Urban Professional's hands and face as they put on SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses. Character has medium-warm skin tone, strong facial features, dark brown textured hair partially visible in frame. Hands with natural skin texture lift the gold metal aviator frames from opened black leather case. The iconic gold double-bridge design and teardrop-shaped dark gray-green polarized lenses are prominently featured as main focus. Hands slowly bring frames toward face, temples extending outward. As the frames slide onto the character's face and settle onto nose and ears, a subtle ethereal pulse of energy ripples outward from the frames in concentric waves - barely visible distortion like heat shimmer or sound wave visualization. The moment the Aviators lock into position, the color grade dramatically shifts: desaturated background suddenly deepens into rich warm tones, golden hour amber light floods in, shadows gain depth. Character's posture visibly straightens and steadies within the frame as transformation completes.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Extreme close-up on hands and lower face, eye level, frames dominating center of composition, shallow depth of field with background soft
Camera motion: Static camera with subtle slow push-in during glasses placement, locked focus on frames throughout
Lighting: Begins with flat cold diffused light, transforms mid-scene to warm golden hour quality with soft directional glow, subtle rim light catching gold metal frames, warm amber fill lighting face
Mood: Transformative, awakening, empowering, magical moment of change, intimate and personal

Actions:
- Hands lift gold Aviator frames from opened black case in lower frame, fingers gripping temples gently (0-1.5 seconds)
- Hands raise frames toward face, temples extending, gold metal catching first hints of warm light (1.5-3 seconds)
- Frames slide onto face, nose pads settling, as they touch face a subtle pulse ripples outward from lenses, color grade shifts dramatically from cold desaturated to warm golden tones (3-4.5 seconds)
- Frames lock into final position on face, character's jaw and shoulders visibly steady and straighten, transformation complete with rich saturated warm lighting (4.5-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Cinematic orchestral rise, intimate close-up sound design, subtle magical chime as frames touch face around 3 seconds, warm analog synthesizer swell, gentle pulse bass frequency matching visual ripple, tempo building from 70 to 90 BPM, rich harmonic layers, inspirational uplifting energy, piano notes adding emotional warmth, crescendo building throughout

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern cinematic documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, rich warm saturated color grade with golden hour tones, vibrant energetic atmosphere, realistic with subtle surreal elements

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional strides confidently through Urban City Streets, now transformed. Character has medium-warm skin tone, strong defined facial features, dark brown textured hair, wearing charcoal gray blazer over white dress shirt and dark indigo jeans, now with perfect posture - shoulders back, head high. SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses sit prominently on their face - gold metal frames catching warm sunlight, dark gray-green polarized lenses displaying subtle magical reflections. The city has come alive: saturated warm colors, vibrant storefronts, golden hour light casting long dramatic shadows. As character walks, the polarized lenses reflect impossible images - newspaper headlines predicting their path, street art murals that mirror their confident silhouette, fleeting glimpses of their destination. Background commuters (now unfrozen and moving naturally) glance at the character, some making subtle nods of recognition and respect. The character moves with effortless rhythm, each step purposeful and smooth.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium shot from slightly low angle (hero angle), character center frame walking toward and slightly past camera, tracking alongside their movement
Camera motion: Smooth steadicam lateral tracking shot moving with character's walking speed, maintaining consistent medium framing
Lighting: Golden hour warm directional sunlight from 45-degree angle, rich amber tones, long dramatic shadows on concrete, warm fill light on character's face, rim light catching gold frames
Mood: Confident, magnetic, effortless cool, in control, timeless swagger, urban mastery

Actions:
- Character strides forward with confident rhythm, Aviators prominent on face catching golden light, polarized lenses showing surreal reflection of newspaper headline about their success (0-2 seconds)
- Camera tracks smoothly alongside as character passes vibrant street art mural that impossibly mirrors their silhouette in real-time, background commuter glances and nods subtly (2-4 seconds)
- Character continues striding, slight knowing smile plays at lips, another commuter makes brief eye contact and nods respect, lenses reflect glimpse of destination ahead, golden hour light glows warmly (4-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Upbeat contemporary indie pop with confident swagger, groovy bass line walking rhythm, tempo 110 BPM, warm analog synthesizers, clean electric guitar riffs with golden tone, crisp snare hits emphasizing steps, handclaps adding energy, brass stabs for punctuation, rich production with vintage warmth, feel-good triumphant energy, urban cool vibe

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern cinematic documentary style with surreal elements, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, rich saturated color grade with cool blue-teal tones mixing with warm amber, dramatic high-contrast lighting, realistic merged with dreamlike quality

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional walks across a modern glass skybridge suspended high above busy traffic. Character has medium-warm skin tone, strong facial features, dark brown textured hair, wearing charcoal gray blazer over white dress shirt and dark indigo jeans, SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses prominently on face with gold frames gleaming. The skybridge is contemporary architecture - floor-to-ceiling glass walls and transparent floor panels showing traffic flowing far below, steel structural beams creating geometric patterns. Harsh afternoon sunlight creates intense reflections and glare on the glass surfaces. As character walks, the chaotic reflections on the glass walls impossibly rearrange themselves - initially fragmented and scattered, they gradually coalesce into a perfect confident silhouette mirror image of the character. Mid-stride, character reaches up with right hand and adjusts the Aviator frames with a subtle confident touch to the temple, and at that precise moment the reflected silhouette snaps into perfect sharp focus, matching their exact pose. The polarized lenses are visibly cutting through the glare, showing crystal clear vision through the chaos.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium-wide shot from side angle perpendicular to character's walking path, showing both character and glass wall reflections simultaneously, slight Dutch angle for dynamic tension
Camera motion: Slow lateral tracking dolly moving smoothly with character's walk, maintaining consistent framing showing both subject and glass reflections
Lighting: Harsh directional afternoon sunlight creating strong highlights and deep shadows, intense glare on glass surfaces, cool blue-teal tones from glass mixing with warm amber sunlight, high contrast with bright hotspots
Mood: Surreal confidence, reality-bending mastery, elevated perspective, symbolic transformation, powerful self-awareness

Actions:
- Character walks steadily across glass skybridge, Aviators prominent on face, harsh reflections on glass walls appear chaotic and fragmented, traffic visible far below through glass floor (0-2 seconds)
- Camera tracks smoothly as character continues walking, fragmented reflections on glass begin subtly rearranging and coalescing, starting to form clearer silhouette shape (2-3.5 seconds)
- Character reaches up with right hand in smooth motion and adjusts Aviator temple with confident subtle touch, at that exact moment reflected silhouette snaps into perfect sharp focus matching their pose (3.5-4.5 seconds)
- Character's hand lowers back down, continues walking with perfect posture, clear confident reflection now moves in sync on glass wall, polarized lenses gleaming and cutting through glare (4.5-6 seconds)

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern cinematic documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, dynamic color grade transformation from desaturated to rich vibrant tones and back to vibrant, golden hour lighting, dramatic reveal aesthetic, realistic with intentional contrast demonstration

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional stands on a modern rooftop overlook with city skyline spread behind them at golden hour. Character has medium-warm skin tone, strong defined facial features, dark brown textured hair, wearing charcoal gray blazer over white dress shirt and dark indigo jeans, SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses initially on face. Urban skyline features mix of contemporary buildings with warm golden hour sunlight. Character faces slightly away from camera showing profile with Aviators visible. In deliberate demonstration, character reaches up and slowly removes the gold Aviator frames from face - the moment frames lift away, the color grade dramatically shifts: vibrant city dulls to washed-out desaturated tones, golden light becomes flat and gray, atmosphere loses energy. Character holds frames at arm's length for beat, examining them with slight smile. Then they smoothly slide the Aviators back onto face - instantly the city snaps back into vivid saturated colors, golden hour warmth floods back, everything locks into sharp vibrant focus. Character turns slowly toward camera with Aviators now prominent, confident expression, city glowing behind them. Final frame holds on hero shot: character foreground with gold Aviators catching perfect golden light, vibrant city skyline background, composition ready for logo overlay.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium shot transitioning to medium close-up, initially showing profile then rotating to frontal hero angle, character positioned right of center with skyline background left
Camera motion: Slow subtle arc around character from profile to three-quarter frontal view, gentle push-in tightening framing, ending on locked hero frame
Lighting: Golden hour warm directional sunlight (when Aviators on) transforming to flat overcast (when Aviators off) then back to golden warmth, dramatic lighting shifts synchronized with glasses removal/replacement, rim light on character's silhouette
Mood: Demonstrative, powerful, transformative, conclusive, aspirational, brand statement moment, timeless confidence

Actions:
- Character stands in profile on rooftop with Aviators on face, vibrant golden hour city glowing behind, slight wind in hair, contemplative powerful stance (0-1.5 seconds)
- Character reaches up with both hands and slowly removes gold Aviator frames from face, lifting them away - color instantly drains to desaturated flat tones, city dulls, light flattens (1.5-3 seconds)
- Character holds frames at arm's length examining them, slight knowing smile, city remains dull and washed-out, pause demonstrating the difference (3-4 seconds)
- Character smoothly slides Aviators back onto face - instant snap back to rich vibrant saturated colors, golden hour warmth floods scene, everything locks into vivid focus (4-5 seconds)
- Character turns slowly toward camera revealing frontal view, Aviators prominent catching golden light, confident expression, perfect hero shot composition with glowing city behind, frame holds for logo overlay (5-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Cinematic orchestral finale building to triumphant resolution, inspiring piano melody, tempo 85 BPM building to 100 BPM, rich string section swelling, warm brass fanfare, subtle electronic elements adding modern edge, clear moment of silence/reduction at 2-3 seconds when glasses removed (matching visual drain), powerful return and crescendo at 4 seconds when glasses go back on, epic satisfying conclusion with sustained final chord, premium brand statement energy
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (confident, warm, authoritative voice with slight rasp): SunVue. Own what you see.
